description:
From phyto- +‎ plankton.
From Ancient Greek φυτόν (phutón, “plant”) + πλαγκτόν (planktón), neuter of πλαγκτός (planktós, “wandering”). However, they are no longer classified as plants, so the terminology is showing a historical meaning.

entries.meaning: Plankton, especially those small in size, that obtain energy by photosynthesis.
